title: OCE Streamers and Youtubers?
body:
-
Hey guys I watch a lot of American streamers and youtubers, but I don't know many others apart from MidBeast, could you guys suggest some for me? Links would be appreciated.

replies.body:
**Pianta **makes short, hilarious videos. https://www.youtube.com/user/aceo671 Also well-known for his really relatable and inspirational "Is your game winnable" video ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jeyc6fGresM )

**Tilterella **makes a lot of those experiment videos on Sion and Orianna. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCv2qkByYQkcEbgzXUiPMSqA

**Jay Sea** does a lot of educational content (mainly focused around Top lane), and recently just finished a Bronze to Diamond series. https://www.youtube.com/user/JaySeaChannel

**Waffle Jr - OCE KhaZix** is another one. He is the one who made "I am The Fast", with hyperspeed Jhin in URF. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1-Z037mWnQ-73-10lQuHIA

Hope this helps <3
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
Wow, this is a huge amount of local talent, i might tune into them and have a look. Thanks for sharing mate

and corvytv - very small time streamer 

and eggzy - shaco main
I'm a small time streamer myself, I one trick thresh. Currently sitting at 1.3 million mastery.. If you want to have a peak or show support! https://www.twitch.tv/lexythedeer
Yeah twitch.tv/maxapm3 is insane i've heard he beat faker and apdo in a 2v1 and his content is literally insane
